title: Deep sea cameras
text:
Since 2012, we have deployed a total of 725 deep sea cameras over the world’s oceans.














The deepest camera deployed so far landed at 4111 meters in the offshore region of Colombia known as Colinas y Lomas in the Pacific Ocean.

title: Deep sea cameras
text: The deepest camera deployed so far landed at 4111 meters in the offshore region of Colombia known as Colinas y Lomas in the Pacific Ocean.

title: Welcome to the scientific world of National Geographic Pristine Seas
text: Here, you will (eventually) be able to learn more about the research we do, how we do it, the places we’ve explored, and the lessons we hace learned. In the meantime, this is just a placeholder :)
